name: Sam's GS Stash Cigars
additionalNotes: The cigars have an oily Nicaraguan corojo wrapper, with Nicaraguan tobacco also used for the filler and binder. It is a full-bodied cigar. The brand consists of only one size, 6.5 x 52. Sam's GS Stash Cigars is a brand of hand-made premium cigars owned by the Black Cat Cigar Company.
